name: Robe of the Archmage
description: A powerful robe imbued with arcane energy, granting the wearer enhanced spellcasting abilities.
looks: The robe is made of shimmering blue fabric with intricate golden runes embroidered along the edges.

special_weapon_skills.Arcane Mastery: Increases the potency of arcane spells by 20%.

special_effects.Arcane Shield: Creates a magical barrier that absorbs 50 points of damage.

name: Fireball Scroll
description: A scroll containing the spell to cast a powerful fireball.
looks: The scroll is made of aged parchment with intricate runes inscribed on it.

special_effects.burning: The fireball sets the target on fire, causing additional damage over time.

name: Giant Slayer Sword
description: A massive sword designed specifically to slay giant creatures.
looks: The Giant Slayer Sword is a towering weapon with a long, razor-sharp blade and a sturdy hilt. Its size and weight make it a formidable weapon against giant creatures.

special_weapon_skills.Giant Slayer: Grants the wielder increased damage against giant creatures.

name: Fireball Scroll
description: A parchment scroll containing a fireball spell. When activated, it unleashes a powerful explosion of fire.
looks: The scroll is made of aged parchment and sealed with a red wax seal. The incantation is written in a language unknown to most.

special_effects.burning: The target is set on fire, taking additional damage over time.

name: Speed Boots
description: A pair of boots that enhance the wearer's speed.
looks: The boots are sleek and black, made of a lightweight material.

name: Shield of Protection
description: A sturdy shield that provides additional defense against physical attacks.
looks: The shield is made of polished metal and is adorned with intricate engravings.

name: Frost Sword
description: A sword imbued with the power of ice.
looks: The sword has a silver blade with a blue icy aura surrounding it.

special_weapon_skills.ice_slash: Allows the user to perform a powerful ice-based slash.

name: Fireball Scroll
description: A scroll containing a powerful fireball spell. When read aloud, it unleashes a fireball that damages enemies.
looks: The scroll is made of aged parchment, with intricate fiery runes etched into it.

special_effects.burning: Targets hit by the fireball have a chance to catch on fire, taking damage over time.

name: Flaming Sword
description: A sword with a blade engulfed in flames.
looks: The sword has a long, silver blade with intricate engravings. The hilt is made of black leather and adorned with a ruby.

special_weapon_skills.fire_sword: Allows the wielder to summon fire from the sword to attack enemies.

special_effects.fireburst: Has a chance to create a burst of flames on successful hit.

name: Poisoned Dagger
description: A small dagger coated with deadly poison.
looks: The dagger has a slim, silver blade and a black handle. The blade is covered in a green, viscous liquid.

special_weapon_skills.assassination: Increases damage dealt when attacking from behind.
